description: People who are vital to keeping the island running may be able enter the island.
title: Coronavirus: Isle of Man shuts borders to non-residents
title_page: Coronavirus: Isle of Man shuts borders to non-residents - BBC News
maintext: "People who live on the Island will be able to return home, and will be required to adhere to the new law on mandatory self-isolation for 14 days, regardless of whether or not they have symptoms."
